snippet: In a reversal that stunned economists and investors, the Federal Reserve said it would continue to buy bonds to encourage growth, at least for another month and quite possibly into next year.
abstract: Federal Reserve says it will continue its efforts to help economy grow, reversal that stuns economists and thrills investors; Fed will continue to buy bonds to encourage economic growth, at least for another month and quite possibly well into 2014.

byline.contributor: Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt.

lead_paragraph: In a reversal that stunned economists and investors, the Federal Reserve said it would continue to buy bonds to encourage growth, at least for another month and quite possibly into next year.

headline.main: In Surprise, Fed Decides to Maintain Pace of Stimulus
headline.print_headline: In Surprise, Fed Is to Maintain Pace of Stimulus
